.. py:function:: harvest(topic, years = '>=2018', max_works = 20000)

   
   Compute harvest.

   Carry out the harvest operation.

   :param topic: Description for ``topic``.
   :type topic: str
   :param years: Description for ``years``.
   :type years: str | None
   :param max_works: Description for ``max_works``.
   :type max_works: int | None
